Package edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.controller

Contains controllers that implement the the REST endpoints along with utility classes containing constants.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationConstants
    Contains constants used by the annotation controller.
    AnnotationController
    The WAP controller used for requests to annotations
    BackupController
    The WAP Controller used for requests to generate Backups of the Database during normal operation.
    BasicController
    Base class for all Controllers where common behavior is implemented.
    CatchAllController
    This controller adds the catch all feature to the server which answers all request that not mapped correctly
    ContainerConstants
    Contains constants used by the container controllers
    ContainerController
    The WAP Controller used for requests Containers
    JavadocController
    The Controller used to serve the JavaDoc
    PageConstants
    Contains constants used by the page controller
    PageController
    The WAP Controller used for requests to Pages
    SimpleFolderServerController
    Simple folder controllers are simple http servers which serve a given folder in the filesystem.
    WapController
    Base class for all Wap Controllers where common behavior is implemented.
    WapPathMatcher
    This implementation of a PathMatcher introduces patterns needed for implementation of the WAP server.
    WebClientController
    The WebClient Controller used for requests to the integrated web client

Package edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.controller Description

Contains controllers that implement the the REST endpoints along with utility classes containing constants.

Another major part is the PathMatcher implementation which needs to be able providing REST endpoints not following fixed layouts.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt
